message.body: An Alex Katz piece is on Antiques Roadshow.
!! Right now?! I wish I had a tv!
Indeed. It's purrdy! It looks like something you would paint:-)
Ps they are Still fixing my car...for the second time...they might buy me out they said bc it's costing them more money than it's worth :/
Oh no!
They might just give me my money back :( :( my poor baby Acura
Omg
That's not good at all.
What was wrong with it?
ï¿¼
Yeah so I'm driving a vw now :(
Rental
They've paid for all repairs and all my rentals but it still really stinks
Bc I loved that Acura
I became emotionally invested
I know! You were so happy about it!
:( it's brakes have issues and it's transmission has issues :(
How is your truck
Yikes transmission issues are not joke
No***
My truck is good other than the bumpyness is giving me pain. Remember those UTIs I was having? Well apparently I really missed up my nerves in my butt. So long story short I need to buy another car.
And I am sad.
Wait really!???
A less bumpy one???
One w good suspension?
:( like a ...soccer mom car? I know how much that upsets you lol
That seriously is awful I'm sorry
Maybe. Right now I'm looking for a fancy lexus on craigslist. I'll be part of the illuminati.
Unfortunately my truck is running very well and I did so much stuff to it. I probably have 3k in repairs on jihad.
At least I know what's the issue and I'm feeling better. I have to do special exercises and take medicine for it. I'm seeing a doctor at penn now and he's very good. He looks like Sartre.
That means you're in my neighborhood often. Text me if you ever want to grab lunch or do something near Penn. Looking like Sartre has to be a good omen...
Hahaha oh yeah I'm feeling better! We should hang out soon!
